title: 3rd party programs bannable?
body: Hello I was wondering if using a third party program called " skin preview " that ONLY AND ONLY changes the way your skin looks against the terms of service and not allowed?.  It doesn't give you timers or chat spam anything like it that it's only for changing the appearance of the skin of your choice.

replies.body: We're not currently banning a player for use skin mods, but that can change at anytime.  We also don't support any third party programs, so we couldn't assist if you run into technical issues or if any malicious content is found hidden within.  Check out our [3rd party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and use caution.  It's better to be safe!
Yes it will cause a perma Ban. If you think about it it makes sense. it's theft or fraud. You use Riot Made skins without paying for them.
